name: Cube Trap
description:
Try to get out of the maze.You only have 5 seconds to memorise the location of traps and try to work around them.Can you get out alive?This is only a demo version, but together we can do much more.Share with friends and follow us on twitter,always be aware of updates.

If you like and you want to play full version on your mobile or tablet you can support us.Hope you enjoy

The full version will be available:

 - More than 200 levels

- Mazes become more complex and there will be new traps

- Skills and improvements systems

- Ability to create and share levels with your friends

- Table of records and top player

Follow us: https://twitter.com/thelittledevil7
